assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ethical approval for the study was granted by the Research Ethics and Ethics Committee at Calvary Health Care Bethlehem (ref: 17102603). All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000 (5). Informed consent was obtained from all patients for being included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
